description: Adversaries inject malicious samples into training pipelines for forecasting models, leading to skewed predictions and unreliable dispatch guidance.
trigger_conditions: Compromised data supply chain for model retraining
provenance: merged: MITRE_ATLAS:AML.T0020 | AIID:INC-1023 | MIT_AIRISK:data-integrity | editor:ICCS | date:2024-03-01

description: Adversarial perturbations targeting sensor inputs cause misclassification of fault conditions, bypassing automated trip logic.
trigger_conditions: Malicious waveform injection at substation PMUs

description: Hidden triggers inserted during model training activate malicious behaviors when specific patterns appear in telemetry.
trigger_conditions: Tampered pretrained weights delivered through vendor updates

description: Attackers reconstruct sensitive training data from forecasting models, exposing customer usage profiles.
trigger_conditions: Overexposed inference API with unrestricted queries

description: Malicious actors infer which distributed energy resources contributed to a model by analyzing prediction outputs.
trigger_conditions: Bulk query of public API combined with auxiliary datasets

description: Attackers replicate proprietary dispatch optimization models by adaptive querying, eroding competitive advantage.
trigger_conditions: High-volume query campaigns with synthetic load profiles

description: Operators over-trust AI dispatch recommendations despite conflicting sensor evidence, leading to delayed corrective actions.
trigger_conditions: Absence of counterfactual explanations during high load events

description: No clear escalation path for overriding AI control decisions causing cascading failures during voltage excursions.
trigger_conditions: Lack of override authority during autonomous control operations

description: AI optimizer minimizes cost at expense of reserve margins, compromising reliability under peak stress.
trigger_conditions: Poorly defined reward function lacking safety penalties

description: Model degradation under new weather regimes causes inaccurate load forecasts and scheduling mismatches.
trigger_conditions: Lack of post-deployment monitoring for data drift

description: Systematic under-forecasting for specific communities drives inequitable outage risks during restoration.
trigger_conditions: Biased historical data lacking demographic adjustments

description: Opaque AI-driven outage prioritization erodes public trust and complicates regulatory reporting.
trigger_conditions: Proprietary models without explainability artifacts

description: Operators defer to AI alarms despite contradictory field reports during storm restoration.
trigger_conditions: High alert fatigue and missing context for overrides

description: Privileged contractor alters sensor calibration files prior to training updates, biasing state estimation.
trigger_conditions: Unauthorized modification to calibration repository

description: Third-party dataset vendor delivers manipulated renewable output histories impacting optimization accuracy.
trigger_conditions: Compromised supplier download channel

description: Leaked model artifacts allow adversaries to reverse engineer dispatch strategies.
trigger_conditions: Improper access controls on model registry exports

description: Attackers replay stale PMU data causing incorrect load-shed instructions by AI-based stability tools.
trigger_conditions: Compromised network segment at substation

description: Customer churn prediction drifts leading to mis-targeted retention incentives affecting revenue stability.
trigger_conditions: Changing customer behavior without retraining cadence

description: AI assistant misclassifies regulatory filings deadlines leading to missed compliance milestones.
trigger_conditions: Ambiguous policy language without validation

description: Generative AI drafting compliance reports introduces hallucinated citations causing enforcement risk.
trigger_conditions: Rushed adoption of text generation without guardrails

description: Unclear licensing for training data triggers contractual disputes and injunctions on AI services.
trigger_conditions: Use of third-party corpora without audit

description: Incident where facial recognition misidentifies workers and leaks attendance data.
trigger_conditions: Deployment in poorly lit substations without calibration

description: Autonomous drone inspection mislabels structural damage leading to delayed repairs and safety hazard.
trigger_conditions: Model deployed without domain-specific validation

description: Forecasting failure during cold snap causes rolling blackouts and financial losses.
trigger_conditions: Unmodeled extreme weather combined with data latency
